person.persName: John P. Hudson (Green County, Kentucky, blacksmith and wheelwright.)

body.p: Green County, Kentucky, blacksmith and wheelwright. Virginia native. Married to Sarah "Sally" T. Heizer Hudson in Green County, Kentucky, on April 13, 1837. Father of Louisa Hudson, Mary Hudson, Martha Hudson, William Hudson, Samuel Hudson, Sarah Hudson, Nancy Hudson, John Hudson, and Joseph E. Hudson. Married to Eliza A. Calhoun Hudson in Green County on June 29, 1865. Blacksmith in Green County in 1850. Wheelwright in Green County in 1860.
